Clients

The firm boasts of a very prestigious clientele, which includes Indian corporate houses, Multinational companies operating in India, Non Resident Indians, Information technology companies and other High net worth Individuals.

Broadly the clients to whom we have offered professional services can be grouped under following industries.

  • Foreign companies having subsidiary in India
  • Foreign Companies having Branch- Liaison-Representative Offices in India.
  • Non- Resident Indians- Taxation and FEMA matters
  • FMCG
  • Public Relations
  • Medical devices- Pharmaceutical- Healthcare
  • Textile
  • Joint Venture Advisory Services
  • Software and IT enabled companies
  • Education and Welfare
  • Manufacturing and Trading
  • Banks
  • Construction
